parameters.name: searchParameters.offset
parameters.description:
Set number of "limits" to skip.
Optional. Only works if limit is set.

parameters.name: searchParameters.limit
parameters.description:
Max number of items to retrieve.
Optional.

parameters.name: searchParameters.sort
parameters.description:
Define sort order. Prefix '+' for ascending (default if omitted), '-' for descending. 
Example: '+name' ('name'), -date.
Optional.

parameters.name: searchParameters.fields
parameters.description:
Select subset of fields to be returned.
Optional.

post.description:
Get OAuth authentication token for use with other endpoints. 
                                    Making a call with grant_type=password using username and password for the employee 
                                    (client_id and client_secret are mandatory as well) an access token and a refresh token will be received. 
                                    If access token expired, a new one can be received by making a new call with grant_type=refresh_token and the 
                                    refresh_token without sending username and password again. The refresh_token will be regenerated as well.
                                    Optionally use grant_type=google and provide base64 encoded google_id_token returned from Google SignIn 
                                    (employee has to authorize, with Google, access to his/hers email).

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: [password], [refresh_token], [google], and [api_key] are the supported grant types

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Optional on QA, mandatory on deploy

offset.description:
Set number of "limits" to skip.
Optional. Only works if limit is set.

limit.description:
Max number of items to retrieve.
Optional.

sort.description:
Define sort order. Prefix '+' for ascending (default if omitted), '-' for descending. 
Example: '+name' ('name'), -date.
Optional.

fields.description:
Select subset of fields to be returned.
Optional.
